name: SEACORP 02.06.2002
description:
---This CD is Property of SEACORP and not for public release. ---

Date:       …            02.06.2002

Ship:        …            SC Excalibur

Crew       …            Joe Miller

 

Footage recovered from the seabed near the DV-12 oil rig and Excalibur wreck, Point of view is from Joe Millers body cam.

 

Controls

WASD                  =             Walk

Mouse                  =             Look

ESC                        =             Quit

 

**Made as part of the HPS1 Summer of Shivers Jam, all content created by myself.  Game is roughly 15 mins long.**
